body.name: Lighted Shower Mirror Fogless for Shaving, Heated Fog Free Large 9.5*8inch 3 Color Modes Dimming Shower Shaving Mirror with Light, Rechargeable Anti-Fog Shower Mirror with Storage Tray & Razor Holders
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Revolutionary Heated Shower Mirror Fogless for Shaving】 Preheat 1-3mins, this shower mirror with intelligent heating chip tech will warm up the mirror surface to evaporate the mist and prevent it from fogging. Convenient and Long Lasting! No need to use short-lived anti-fog spray! No need to use cumbersome squeegee! No need to fill and empty hot water every time!

【Rechargeable 5000mAh Large Capacity Battery】This fogless mirror for shower is built-in 5000mAh rechargeable lithium battery which equivalent to 18*AA batteries. It only need one charge for 2-4 weeks with the included type-c charging cable.

【3 Color Modes & Adjustable Brightness】 This fog free shower mirror has 3 color lighting- cool light, natural light, warm light for different occasions. Short press the on/off button to change the color of light; Hold the button longer, brightness dim or bright. Features a memory function that will remember the brightness and the color mode of the last set.

【Energy Saving】Heating button turns on, the intelligent chip will detects the ambient temperature, when the temperature is above 100.4°F (38°C) , the mirror will automatically stops heating and when it is lower than 89.6℉(32℃), the mirror will re-heating to prevent it from fogging. PLS NOTED: To save energy, the heating function will automatically turn off in 10mins, the LED light will automatically turn off in 30mins.

【Larger Size & Adjustable Angle】This 9.5X8inch larger anti-fog shower mirror features a bigger reflective surface for a better using experience. Real glass high quality density mirror for clearer vision. This shower shaving mirror can tilt up and down 30°to provides the perfect viewing angle for shaving, tweezing, removing makeup, or perfecting your look.

【Mirror with Deep & Wide Shelf】This fogless shaving mirror for shower comes with 2 razor holders and a retractable wide storage shelf to put the shaving cream and other accessories, keeping essentials organized and within arm’s reach, enjoying a more efficient shower experience.

【Easy Installation】You can use it by attaching Wall adhesive tape. Don't worry about mistakes, we have included two pieces of Wall adhesive tape, which can also be used in the future when you need to change the position of the mirror. It is also equipped with screws to meet the needs of all installation environments.

【Gift Highly Recommend to Men】 With fogless shower mirror with light, he can shave while in the shower which means no more hassle morning that wasting time cleaning up a messy sink. And a much cleaner bathroom will be loved and appreciated by family members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well featured shower mirror
reviews.reviewText: The mirror comes with two mounting methods, regular screws with anchors and double sided tape. For most purposes, the tape will be plenty strong as the mount together with the mirror don't weight all that much and you don't have to put holes in your walls/tile. The only qualm here is that it would be nice if the mirror also had side to side tilt, but up/down is fine enough. Mirror can be removed from the mount for recharging. Mount is made out of very thick and substantial plastic, and has a folding shelf.The mirror itself doesn't seem to have a waterproof rating, but appears to be plenty waterproof for splashes. The USB-C port is covered with a gasket, and as long as it's facing down, it should be safe from any moisture ingress. Heats up fairly fast, and is truly fogless. Three different lighting temperatures.The main advantage to me is the massive internal battery. Most mirrors of this type have significantly less, or are not as resistant to moisture due to needing to have a battery compartment. Having this be a large rechargeable battery means less time spent recharging and swapping out batteries. Also, the USB-C port does charge via a C-C cable so the correct circuitry is included for futureproofing, even though an A-C cable is used by default.Other accessories are not very notable, but nice to have - small scissors and tweezers.Very recommended due to the great feature list and a reasonable price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steamy Vision Made Crystal Clear!
reviews.reviewText: Foggy bathroom mirrors after a hot shower are a thing of the past thanks to this Lighted Shower Fogless Mirror! This innovative product has transformed my shower routine, and here's why:No more wiping the mirror every few seconds just to catch a glimpse of yourself while shaving or applying skincare. This mirror utilizes built-in heating technology to effectively prevent fogging, even in the steamiest showers. It's a game-changer!This mirror isn't just fogless, it's also illuminated with adjustable LED lights. Choose from warm, cool, or natural light to create the perfect ambiance for your morning or evening routine. No more struggling to see in dimly lit bathrooms!Mounting the mirror was a breeze thanks to the included adhesive strips and screws. It adheres securely to a variety of surfaces, making it suitable for different bathroom setups. Plus, the sleek and modern design complements any bathroom decor.The mirror boasts a touch sensor for easy light control, even with wet hands. The built-in clock helps you manage your shower time efficiently. And, for those who enjoy listening to music or podcasts while showering, the Bluetooth speaker is a delightful bonus!All in all, this Fogless Mirror is a fantastic addition to any bathroom. It's functional, stylish, and packed with convenient features that make your shower experience more enjoyable and efficient. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a fog-free and well-lit oasis in their shower!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Choice! Multi-Mode Lighted Heated No-Fog Shower Mirror for Any Surface
reviews.reviewText: I've always needed one of these but with no power behind the shower wall, I was stuck. When this came available, it was a no-brainer to try. I was initially concerned as my shower area has a curved textured tile wall - BUT no worries! The adhesive pad is Super Sticky AND at 4-1/4" is just slightly wider than my 3-1/4" tiles. It is thick enough that the overlap is No Problem AND it easily handled my textured tile. I did use a level to ensure correct placement AND I did let it sit for the recommended 12 hours before re-attaching the mirror panel (plenty of time for the mirror to charge). You need to be very careful when placing this (start in one corner, then down one edge) because once its stuck, It Is Stuck! There is a tiny LED indicator at the bottom of the mirror: red = charging, green = full, blue = heating (it comes with tweezers, a small scissors, an extra glue pad, mounting hardware, and the USB-A to C charging cable but not the power block). The battery is 5Ah and the mirror heater is 12 Watt - assuming the standard 3.7V Lithium battery the heater should run for 1.54 Hr (9 ten minute cycles) between recharging.
